message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40. I'm willing to compromise!
Your offer was a bit imbalanced. I think this is more fair considering the money loses value over time.
Considering the inflation, I'm willing to take a bit less than before, but I still think I deserve the bigger share.
This is my final offer. A 50/50 split is the fairest option. The value of the money will only continue to decrease for you.
